strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3>

<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3>
+ <Cap><string_4>
<se_def>*: <IF_SOLO>Pilgrim<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>Pilgrims<ENDIF_SOLO>! I bid you welcome to Savella, sacred seat of the Lord High Priest.
<se_def>*: Glory be to His Holiness and all devout pilgrims!
<se_def>*: You must have seen it. The beautiful mansion perched up there on that precarious rock.<page>*: Looks like it should fall over at any moment, doesn't it?
<se_def>*: That's the home of the Lord High Priest. Pray to it and the Goddess will reward you with Her divine protection.
<se_def>*: Well! What a momentous occasion! Savella Cathedral at last! Finally, I can tread this holy soil with my own two feet!
<se_def>*: Unbelievable!
<se_high>*: Please grant us eternal peace. Please protect us from monsters that would do us harm.
<se_def>*: Step right up! Step right up! Get your souvenir coins, pennants and postcards here!
<se_high>*: That strange rock doesn't move even in the strongest gale. It's the Lord High Priest's strength that keeps it there.
<se_high>*: He really is a most incredible man...
<se_high>*: Hello, <IF_SOLO>pilgrim<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>pilgrims<ENDIF_SOLO>. Would you like a biscuit shaped like the cathedral?
<se_low>*: It's been my lifelong desire to see Savella Cathedral before I die. Thank the Goddess I made it in time!
<se_low>*: Now I'm ready for heaven, whenever the Goddess decides to take me!
<se_def>*: I don't know if it's got something to do with the Godbird Empyrea, but the Lord High Priest certainly seems to have a thing for birds.
<se_def>*: The garden at the back of his mansion is full of them.
<se_low>*: With the number of pilgrims and tourists that pass through here, I get to hear all the rumours, you know.
<se_low>*: Just the other day, I heard about this strange sword they call the ‘shamshir of light’.
<se_low>*: You make it from a rune staff, a shield, and some sparkling cloth.<page>*: It doesn't look anything like a sword, apparently.
<se_low>*: When it senses an enemy, it readies itself for battle all of its own accord! It sounds totally bizarre if you ask me!
<se_high>*: Miaoooow.
<se_high>*: Birds are messengers from the Goddess. If you tease them, you'll suffer the wrath of the Godbird Empyrea!
<se_high>*: She was the great bird who saved the world from the Lord of Darkness, Rhapthorne, long, long ago.
<se_def>*: This is Savella Cathedral. Its doors are always open.
<se_def>*: Hm, you seem harmless enough. Proceed!

<se_low>*: How about saying a few prayers here
yourself?
<se_def>*: The late Abbot of Maella Abbey, Holy Father Francisco, was an old friend of His Holiness. They were classmates.
<se_def>*: Apparently, when it was suggested that he might one day be the next Lord High Priest, he declined the position.<page>*: He claimed he wasn't equal to the task.
<se_def>*: Only those of superlative lineage, education and faith can serve here at Savella Cathedral.
<se_def>*: How dare he<endash>
<se_def>*: I mean, er... Never mind!
<se_def>*: This building connects the Lord High Priest's mansion with the cathedral.
<se_def>*: Only those summoned by His Holiness are permitted to ascend to his residence at the top.
<se_def>*: Have a look around by all means, but don't slip over the edge!
<se_high>*: Even here, as close as one can possibly be to the Goddess on this earth, I still feel uneasy.
<se_high>*: I can't help but think that something terrible is going to happen...
<se_low>*: I'm praying for safety on my journey to the Holy Isle of Neos.
<se_high>*: I heard a rumour that an evil creature went on the rampage in Orkutsk and killed someone.
<se_high>*: Dear Goddess, I beg for you to bring your judgement on this evil, and to ease the hearts of those grieving in that frozen land...
<se_def>*: I was sailin' down a river in the eastern continent when I saw this really weird cave under a bridge! What a find!
<se_def>*: I bet you it's the legendary Captain Crow's cave! It's gotta be!
<se_def>*: I couldn't get inside cos it was locked up. But I'll wager there's some great treasure stashed away in there!
<se_high>*: The other night, when there was a new moon, I saw the shadow of some big, black thing flying around outside the cathedral!
<se_high>*: It went away quite quickly, but it was really scary at the time.
<se_low>*: All the talk of this big black shadow is causing quite a stir.
<se_low>*: I wonder if it was the Godbird Empyrea?
<se_high>*: I'm sure something terrible is going to happen very soon.
<se_high>*: Try as I might, I can't rid myself of this feeling that something awful is coming. I keep praying, but the feeling just won't subside.
<se_low>*: People say Captain Crow had some amazin' map called the ‘illuminated sea chart’.
<se_low>*: It's s'posed to guide ya to this strange island that no normal boat can get to.
<se_def>Lorenzo: So this is the famous Savella Cathedral! How utterly splendiferous!
<se_def>Lorenzo: I simply MUST buy a pennant as a souvenir. Ah, it looks like they're on sale over there!
<se_high>*: I saw it! I saw it! A terrifying black shadow, it was!
<se_high>*: It circled over the cathedral and then disappeared. Oooh, just thinking about it sends a shiver down my spine!
<se_low>*: I wonder what's behind this black shadow that's causing such a stir?
<se_low>*: I do hope nothing ill comes of it.
<se_def>*: I went back to that pirate's hideout thinkin' I'd bust the lock and get in, but the door was already open!
<se_def>*: Someone must've beat me to it! What a bleedin' nerve! I found it first!
<se_low>*: My brother's a right unlucky one, y'know.
<se_low>*: That's why I come here to the cathedral. To try an' help him out a bit. Hope it works.
<se_def>*: What is it!? What happened!? Just calm down and tell me everything!
<se_def>*: I saw it! I saw it! A terrifying shape up in the sky!
<se_def>*: A dark, black evil right above me... You've got to believe me!
<se_def>*: An enormous black shadow passed over the cathedral just now.
<se_def>*: It looked like it was headed for the Lord High Priest's residence. I hope the guards up there have spotted it.
<se_def>*: Dear Goddess! Your Holiness! I beg of you! Don't let me die! Waaaaah!
<se_high>*: MEEEEEOOOOOW!
<se_low>*: Repent your sins!
<se_low>*: The dark angel of death is here to punish us for our misdeeds! Repent and save your soul!!!
<se_high>*: Aaargh! It flew off in the direction of the Lord High Priest's mansion...
<se_high>*: When it's finished with him, it'll come back for us! We'll all be eaten alive!
<se_high>*: Shh! Don't talk to me!
<se_high>*: I'm hiding from that horrible big bird-like thing. I wish it would go away!
<se_def>*: Come on! Pull yourself together!
<se_def>*: There's no time for this! I must protect His Holiness!
<se_high>*: Oh, no... Oh, no... That terrible, black dog... Oh, Your Holiness!
<se_def>*: I can feel it. I can feel an evil power getting closer and closer. Oh, dear Goddess! Please protect His Holiness!
<se_low>*: This ain't good! It ain't good at all!
<se_low>*: I dunno what's goin' on, but it's BIG, an' it's BAD!
<se_def>*: Argh! Those Templars! Just looking at them makes my blood boil!
<se_def>*: Captain Marcello sent for us urgently! We've been summoned to the Lord High Priest's mansion!
<se_def>*: Where's the platform!? Blast! There's no way we can make the climb in time to help His Holiness! We'd need wings to get up there!
<se_def>*: An evil creature is threatening the Lord High Priest's life!
<se_def>*: The good name of the Templars is at stake! We must protect His Holiness at all costs!
<se_def>*: Savella is shrouded by a cloud of misery at the moment.
<se_def>*: All we can do is bow our heads, and hope we meet His Holiness in our prayers...
<se_def>*: I heard that His Holiness passed away before daybreak.
<se_def>*: That was the report from Marcello, the man who's to become the new Lord High Priest.
<se_high>*: Purrr...
<se_high>*: It was that black monster! That's what killed the Lord High Priest!
<se_def>*: They say His Holiness woke early and decided to take a walk around the mansion. But then he slipped and fell.
<se_def>*: All the domestics were still asleep, apparently. No one realised what had happened.
<se_def>*: The Goddess's chosen one or not, no one could survive a fall from that height...
<se_def>*: It's a bit quick, isn't it? You know, for the next guy to be having the inauguration ceremony so soon after...well, you know.
<se_def>*: I bet it's mayhem over on Neos at the moment!
<se_high>*: They say it's vital to have a successor as soon as possible so that His Holiness can rest in peace.
<se_high>*: That's why they're having the funeral and the inauguration ceremony for the new Lord High Priest so soon.
<se_high>*: Your exalted and noble Holiness, may you rest in peace...
<se_low>*: May your eternal sleep be untroubled, Your Holiness.
<se_def>*: Are you here to pray for His Holiness? Then you must visit his residence.
<se_def>*: I'm sure there won't be any objection to you using the ascension way if you've come to offer your condolences.
<se_low>*: I don't know. The world seems to be losing some of its finest people lately.
<se_low>*: I suppose it shall be my turn before long.
<se_def>*: You look like you've travelled a considerable way to come and offer your prayers for His Holiness. You may pass.
<se_high>*: ...I've got a feeling. A terrible feeling that some awful disaster is going to shroud the whole world in darkness.
<se_high>*: Oh, Your Holiness! Protect us from on high!
<se_low>*: Apparently they found His Holiness's body at the foot of the rock on which his mansion stands.
<se_low>*: But there's a most disturbing rumour going around. People are saying that there was some[-]thing that looked like a stab wound on his body.
<se_high>*: I never had the pleasure of a personal audience with His Holiness.
<se_high>*: But he was the cornerstone of our faith. He gave strength to all of us.
<se_def>*: You can go inside the Lord High Priest's mansion again today, apparently. I'd like to go and offer a prayer myself.
<se_def>*: A fat lot of good the Templars did! His Holiness is still dead, isn't he!?
<se_def>*: If you want to talk, you'll have to step outside.
<se_def>*: You should cleanse <IF_SOLO>yourself<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>yourselves<ENDIF_SOLO> with the holy water over there before you proceed further into the church.
The monk is so deep in prayer, he doesn't notice <leader>.
<se_high>*: His Holiness is certainly worthy of being called a great sage. Wouldn't you agree?
<se_low>*: A traveller told me that a castle somewhere in the east has been cursed with thorns and left in ruins.
<se_low>*: What phenomenal magic, to destroy an entire castle! The person responsible must possess incredible power.
<se_low>*: No doubt it won't end with the castle. Evil has a habit of spreading.
<se_low>*: Still, at least His Holiness and everyone here at Savella Cathedral will be safe.
<se_def>*: ...Please, let him fail. Let him fall from power...
<se_def>*: Do you know this Marcello man? He's taken the place of Abbot Francisco, who was an old childhood friend of His Holiness.
<se_def>*: He's a mere Templar, yet already he's taken charge of His Holiness's personal guard. Such a rapid ascent through the ranks is...most unusual.
<se_def>*: I mean, what has he got that I haven't!? It should be me who's<endash> Er! I mean! ...Forget I said anything!
<se_low>*: Even I'm feeling the cold. I didn't put enough clothes on this morning.
<se_low>*: His Holiness the Lord High Priest guides all true followers of the faith.
<se_low>*: His wisdom and virtue are said to be equal to that of the great sages of old.
<se_def>*: I wonder if His Holiness is all right? Oh, dear Goddess! Please, ward off that evil dog!
<se_def>*: Please, dear Goddess! Save me! Don't let me die!
<se_high>*: What will we all do if His Holiness is killed!?
<se_high>*: Oh! It doesn't bear thinking about!
<se_high>*: We are in no danger inside the cathedral.
<se_high>*: ...I hope.
<se_low>*: What a frightful beast! It has already taken someone's life in Orkutsk.
<se_low>*: What does this demon want!?
<se_def>Lorenzo: Please, let Jessica fall in love with me!
<se_def>Lorenzo: Oh, why on earth is everyone making so much noise!? I can hardly hear myself pray!
<se_def>*: Go ahead. Say your prayer.
<se_high>*: I was fortunate enough to meet the Lord High Priest once. Such an overwhelmingly kind and gentle man.
<se_high>*: It's simply unbearable that he died so suddenly!
<se_def>*: Dear Lord Priest fella. You, er...did a great job. Er...sleep well, now.
<se_low>*: I'm rushed off my feet. As soon as I've finished praying here, I've got to leave for the Holy Isle of Neos.
<se_low>*: I must get in with the new Lord High Priest, His Holiness Marcello!
The girl is so deep in prayer, she doesn't notice <leader>.
<se_def>*: Have you heard? Apparently His Holiness was murdered by one of his High Priests.
<se_high>*: They foiled the High Priest's attempt to kill His Holiness with some foul creature, but...
<se_high>*: Then His Holiness just falls off a cliff and dies? It just doesn't add up...
<se_def>*: Dear Goddess, don't let that evil black monster come back again!
<se_low>*: That's Savella done. Next stop is the Holy Isle.
<se_high>*: We're on a pilgrimage of the world's holy sites.
<se_def>*: Goddess!
<se_def>*: ...Er... (Mutter, mutter.)
<se_low>*: Ah, yes! Just what you'd expect from lodgings at Savella Cathedral! What a comfortable bed!
<se_low>*: Ah-phew... Ah-phew...
<se_high>*: Dearie me. This one just keeps going on and on about the same thing lately.
<se_high>*: But it can't possibly be true. She must've dreamt it.
<se_def>Lorenzo: Ah-phoo... Ah-Jessica, my-phoo... Ah-phoo...
<se_low>*: Ah-phew... Ah-phew...

<se_def>*: It's such a big event, you'd have thought there'd be some souvenirs on sale.
A commemorative coin or something.<page>*: But there's absolutely nothing!
<se_def>*: I crossed the sea to come here, you know! Aaah, what a waste of time!
<se_low>*: People say Captain Crow had some amazin' map called the ‘illuminated sea chart’.
<se_low>*: It's s'posed to guide ya to this strange island that no normal boat can get to.
<se_high>*: The other night, when there was a new moon, I saw the shadow of some big, black thing flying around outside the cathedral!
<se_high>*: It went away quite quickly, but it was really scary at the time.
<se_high>*: I saw it! I saw it! A terrifying black shadow, it was!
<se_high>*: It circled over the cathedral and then disappeared. Oooh, just thinking about it sends a shiver down my spine!
<se_def>*: I went back to that pirate's hideout thinkin' I'd bust the lock and get in, but the door was already open!
<se_def>*: Someone must've beat me to it! What a bleedin' nerve! I found it first!
<se_low>*: My brother's a right unlucky one, y'know.
<se_low>*: That's why I come here to the cathedral. To try an' help him out a bit. Hope it works.
<se_high>*: I think I'll skip work. I'd like to see the newly-weds.
<se_high>*: They say they're going to make a brief appearance for us ‘normal’ people after the ceremony.
<se_low>*: There's a huge crowd in front of the cathedral. Everyone wants to catch a glimpse of the Princess of Trodain.
<se_def>*: Trodain and Argonia... They say the two royal families have had a marriage arranged for years and years.
<se_def>*: Goes right back to their grandfathers' generation, apparently.
<se_def>*: It's such a wonderful occasion! Two great kingdoms offering their hands in friendship, and exchanging vows of life-long devotion!
<se_low>*: We've been through some difficult times recently, what with His Holiness passing away and all that trouble with the Lord of Darkness.
<se_low>*: But I think this wedding's a turning point. Yup! Things are going to be better from now on, if you ask me.
<se_low>*: The new Lord High Priest is giving his personal blessing to this marriage. Surely it must go down in history as the most splendid union ever!
<se_def>*: Everyone's flocking around the front of the cathedral waiting for the happy couple to appear.
<se_def>*: It's so crowded, you'll be lucky to see them even if they do come out. There's no point going now.
<se_high>Jessica: Princess Medea's being a bit obstinate, isn't she? I mean, who cares about some dusty old promise?<page>Jessica: She should just refuse if she doesn't want to get married.
<se_high>Jessica: Well that's what I'd do, anyway. But maybe things are different if you're a princess.
<se_def>Angelo: You haven't forgotten what I said yesterday? About Medea's happiness?
<se_def>Angelo: Well anyway. I won't say any more. We're all behind you, whatever you decide to do.
<se_def>*: A man and wife are starting their new life together from the cathedral here, not a stone's throw from the Lord High Priest's own home!
<se_def>*: I can only imagine how pilgrims who chose today to visit Savella must feel.<page>*: Seeing the great cathedral for the first time just as the happy couple emerge! Priceless!
<se_def>*: A defining moment in history, marking a new reign of peace and harmony as the great kingdoms of Trodain and Argonia are joined in happy union.
<se_def>*: Of all the rotten luck! One game of rock, paper, scissors and I'm stuck here looking after the shop! I wanted to see the newly-weds too!
<se_low>*: The late Lord High Priest had a great love of birds, they say.
<se_low>*: I should think that's the reason the Godbird Empyrea came to help us all in our hour of need. We should all be very grateful to His Holiness.
<se_high>*: I can't see the Princess at all! To think I've served her all this time! Sometimes I wonder if it's all worth it!
<se_high>*: Look at that! The Templars are blocking all of the entrances!<page>*: There goes my idea of poking my nose 'round the back door and watching the ceremony!
<se_def>Lorenzo: Fancy meeting you here! You remember me! Lorenzo. I was engaged to marry Jessica.
<se_def>Lorenzo: Well anyway, that's all in the past now! Ha ha ha!
<se_def>Lorenzo: Oh, yes! Do you remember High Priest Rolo? Who you were imprisoned with on Purgatory Island? Well, you'll never believe this!
<se_def>Lorenzo: High Priest Rolo is the new Lord High Priest!
<se_def>Lorenzo: I mean, what a miraculous reversal of fortune for the man! Life is just full of surprises, isn't it!?

<se_def>Lorenzo: Just think, it wasn't so long ago that Rolo was being exiled to Purgatory Island!<page>Lorenzo: He must have been pretty well at the lowest possible ebb you could imagine. And yet now he's the Lord High Priest! Can you believe it!?
<se_def>Lorenzo: I mean, what a miraculous reversal of fortune for the man! Life is just full of surprises, isn't it!?
<se_low>Yangus: If we don't shake a leg, they're gonna 'ave got 'itched!
<se_low>Yangus: I'm ready. If ya wanna go in, now's yer only chance.
<se_high>*: Why won't you let us in as well!? Oh! It's so unfair!
<se_low>*: The groom'll be giving the bride a great big kiss about now. Aaah, the lucky beggar!
<se_low>*: Don't come talkin' to me! I don't want people thinkin' I'm with you!
<se_high>*: How dare you oppose the Lord High Priest's personal guard!? Give yourselves up now! Resistance is futile!
<se_low>*: Who are you!? Why on earth would you want to spoil this happy occasion!?
<se_high>*: That's the bride down there. Why are people chasing the bride!? I don't get it.
<se_def>*: What on earth's going on!? Surely that old man fighting with the guards down there isn't trying to kidnap the bride!?
No response. It looks like he's lost consciousness.
No response. It looks like he's lost consciousness.
<se_high>*: Please! Tell your friends to put down their weapons and surrender! It's not too late to give yourselves up!
<se_high>*: Oh, dear Goddess! Please, find it in your heart to forgive these poor sinners who have desecrated a holy service on your soil!
<se_def>*: If they catch ya, it'll be Purgatory Island, mate! You betta scram!
<se_def>*: Uuurgh...
<se_def>*: I can't stand up.
<se_low>*: Ahhh! Heeeelp!
<se_low>*: Please, go easy! I won't stand in your way!
<se_low>*: What on earth happened in there!? What's the panic?
<se_low>*: That old man's tougher than he looks! I think he's going to manage to make off with the bride!
<se_high>*: Yeah. Angelo said you'd force your way into the cathedral.
<se_high>*: Just a<endash>! Isn't that King Trode fighting there next to the bride!?
<se_high>*: It doesn't look like the father of the bride's too happy about giving his daughter away!
<se_high>*: Didn't Angelo tell you? The Princess and the King have been cornered. The guards will capture them if you don't hurry.
<se_def>Lorenzo: That's it! Go on, go on!
<se_def>Lorenzo: What a fabulous wedding! The royals really know how to put on a good show, don't they!?
<se_high>*: Ah, <hero>! Please, do something to save Princess Medea and the King!
<se_def>*: You've seen the blood-red sky, I suppose?
<se_def>*: It's a sign of the Goddess's sorrow. She's mourning the loss of her loyal servant, the Lord High Priest.
<se_def>*: The new Lord High Priest's inauguration ceremony should be over by now, but we've received no word from anyone.
<se_def>*: And that eerie colour in the sky... Something's not right.
<se_low>*: With the number of pilgrims and tourists that pass through here, I get to hear all the rumours, you know.
<se_low>*: Just the other day, I heard about this strange sword they call the ‘shamshir of light’.
<se_low>*: You make it from a rune staff, a shield, and some sparkling cloth.<page>*: It doesn't look anything like a sword, apparently.
<se_low>*: When it senses an enemy, it readies itself for battle all of its own accord! It sounds totally bizarre if you ask me!
<se_def>*: This is Savella Cathedral. Its doors are always open.
<se_def>*: ...Yes. Always.
<se_def>*: There are people saying that the Holy Isle of Neos has been destroyed, but it's just a ridiculous rumour.
<se_high>*: So the day has finally arrived.
<se_high>*: We will all die. Every one of us under this burning sky will die in the flames of hell.
<se_low>*: Goddess! Oh, Goddess!
<se_low>*: My faith is absolute! I have devoted myself to you! Not once have I missed a day of prayer!
<se_low>*: I beseech you! Save me! Save me from this horror!
<se_def>*: I hate to throw cold water on your pilgrimage when you've obviously come so far, but I must ask you to leave.
<se_def>*: The world is in turmoil. Your <IF_SOLO>family<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>families<ENDIF_SOLO> will be worried about you. Go home.
<se_def>*: A disaster like this would never have happened when the Lord High Priest was alive!
<se_high>*: I thought I'd like to lay some flowers where His Holiness passed away, but I don't know where it was.
<se_high>*: They say he fell from his mansion, so it can't have been too far from the cathedral. Somewhere just below the rock, I suppose.
<se_high>*: It's a funny thing, you know. No one seems to know where it happened.
<se_high>*: Thinking back now, the Lord High Priest slipping from that rock was like an omen that this disaster was going to befall the world.
<se_def>*: You know what this is? It's divine punishment, that's what it is!
<se_def>*: The Lord High Priest was murdered, so this is payback for<endash>
<se_def>*: Oooh, it gives me the shivers just thinking about it!
<se_high>*: Meow. Meow.
<se_def>*: Whatever evil demon cares to attack, the Templars will see the cathedral is protected!
<se_def>*: You should cleanse <IF_SOLO>yourself<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>yourselves<ENDIF_SOLO> with the holy water over there before you may proceed further into the church.
The man is so deep in prayer, he doesn't notice <leader>.
<se_high>*: I implore you dear Goddess, just spare my family!
<se_high>*: As long as we remain inside the cathedral, monsters won't be able to attack us.
<se_high>*: ...That's right, isn't it?
<se_low>*: Is it urgent? I am trying to pray, you know. Perhaps it could wait!?
<se_low>*: Dear Goddess... Esteemed Lord High Priest... Please, if you can hear my prayers, protect our fragile world!
<se_high>*: ...Please...somehow...let us return to the days when we all lived in peace!
<se_def>*: Dear Goddess, I must tell you. Marcello is the one you should punish. We monks are your loyal and humble servants.
*: Ah-phew... Ah-phew...
Looks like someone's asleep!
<se_high>*: There's a rumour going around that the red sky spells certain death for all of us, and it's throwing everyone into a panic.
<se_high>*: So I'm praying for everyone to stop worrying.
<se_def>*: Th-This is my space!
<se_def>*: You've got a place to pray back there!
<se_def>*: I'm not scared. I'm not scared...AT ALL!
<se_def>*: I had a wee drinky, see, so noooothing <endash> Hic! <endash> worries me in the slightest! Monshters!? Hah! HIC!
<se_high>*: Why would something like this happen on the joyous day of the new Lord High Priest's inauguration?
<se_high>*: What WAS that eerie red light filling the sky?
<se_def>*: I've been thinking about it a lot. I don't think His Holiness did slip and fall, you know.
<se_def>*: I think... Yes, he was pushed by someone. Someone close to him. I'm convinced of it.
<se_high>*: Ah...Goddess...
<se_high>*: Ah-phew... Ah-phew...
<se_def>*: As soon as the new Lord High Priest, His Holiness Marcello returns, all these strange goings-on will stop.
<se_def>*: But he is taking rather a long time. I hope nothing's happened.
<se_high>*: I pray for peace to return to the world. And for lots of people to come here again and spend lots of money and make me rich. Please.
<se_high>*: His Holiness is certainly worthy of being called a great sage. Wouldn't you agree?
<se_high>*: I'm sure something terrible is going to happen very soon.
<se_high>*: Try as I might, I can't rid myself of this feeling that something awful is coming. I keep praying, but the feeling just won't subside.
<se_def>*: Access to the rear of the cathedral is forbidden until after the wedding ceremony.
<se_def>*: If you wish to see the bride, you will wait patiently for her appearance at the front of the cathedral.
<se_def>Marcello: I don't have time to trifle with the likes of you!
<se_def>*: Hah! Serves him right!
<se_def>*: There's a guard at the top as well. He won't get far trying to steal other people's glory.
